愛.definition: to love; to be fond of; to like; affection; to be inclined (to do sth); to tend to (happen)

愛上.definition: to fall in love with; to be in love with

愛不忍釋.definition: to love sth too much to part with it (idiom)

愛不釋手.definition: (idiom) to like sth so much that one is reluctant to put it down; to find sth utterly irresistible

愛之如命.definition: to love sb (or sth) as one loves life itself

愛優騰.definition: abbr. for iQiyi 愛奇藝|爱奇艺[Ai4 Qi2 yi4] + Youku 優酷|优酷[You1 ku4] + Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4]

愛別離苦.definition: (Buddhism) the pain of parting with what (or whom) one loves, one of the eight distresses 八苦[ba1 ku3]

愛問.definition: iAsk.com, the search engine of Sina 新浪

愛國如家.definition: to love one's country as one's own family (praise for a virtuous ruler)

愛國衛生運動委員會.pinyin: Ai4 guo2 Wei4 sheng1 Yun4 dong4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

愛奇藝.definition: iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010

愛奧尼亞海.definition: Ionian Sea between Italy and Greece

愛好.definition: to like; to be fond of; to take pleasure in; to be keen on; interest; hobby; CL:個|个[ge4]

愛好者.definition: lover (of art, sports etc); amateur; enthusiast; fan

愛屋及烏.definition: lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected; Love me, love my dog.

愛屋及鳥.definition: see 愛屋及烏|爱屋及乌[ai4 wu1 ji2 wu1]

愛得死去活來.pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

愛德華·達拉第.pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 · Da2 la1 di4

愛德華島.definition: Prince Edward Island, province of Canada

愛德華王子島.pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 Wang2 zi3 Dao3

愛心.definition: compassion; kindness; care for others; love; CL:片[pian4]; charity (bazaar, golf day etc); heart (the symbol ♥)

愛心傘.definition: courtesy umbrella (one made available for borrowing)

愛恨交加.definition: to feel a mixture of love and hate

愛惜.definition: to cherish; to treasure; to use sparingly

愛憎分明.definition: to make a clear difference between what one likes and what one hates; to have well-defined likes and dislikes

愛憐.definition: to show tenderness; to coo over; affection

愛戀.definition: in love with; to feel deeply attached to

愛戴.definition: to love and respect; love and respect

愛才.definition: to value talent; to cherish talented people

愛才若渴.definition: (idiom) to be eager to surround oneself with talented people

愛撫.definition: to caress; to fondle; to look after (tenderly); affectionate care

愛新覺羅.definition: Aisin Gioro, family name of the Manchu emperors of the Qing dynasty

愛晚亭.definition: Aiwan Pavilion, on Mt Yuelu 岳麓山 in Hubei, famous beauty spot

愛民.definition: Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang

愛民區.definition: Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang

愛民如子.definition: (idiom) to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)

愛河.definition: the river of love; a stumbling block on the path to enlightenment (Buddhism)

愛港.definition: to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)

愛滋.definition: AIDS (loanword); see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]

愛滋病.definition: variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]

愛漂亮.definition: to like looking attractive (usually of girls); aestheticism

愛爾蘭共和國.pinyin: Ai4 er3 lan2 Gong4 he2 guo2

愛爾蘭共和軍.pinyin: Ai4 er3 lan2 Gong4 he2 jun1

愛爾蘭海.definition: Irish Sea between Ireland and north England

愛玉.definition: see 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3]

愛玉冰.definition: jelly snack made by kneading jelly fig seeds 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3] in water and combining with flavorings (popular in Taiwan and Singapore)

愛玉凍.definition: see 愛玉冰|爱玉冰[ai4 yu4 bing1]

愛玉子.definition: jelly fig seed (Ficus pumila var. awkeotsang)

愛留根納.definition: Eriugena, John Scottus (c. 810-880) Irish poet, theologian, and philosopher of Neoplatonism

愛稱.definition: term of endearment; pet name; diminutive

愛窩窩.definition: glutinous rice cake with a sweet filling; also written 艾窩窩|艾窝窝[ai4 wo1 wo5]

愛羅先珂.definition: Vasili Eroshenko (1890-1952), Russian writer and poet who wrote in Esperanto and Japanese

愛美.definition: to pay attention to one's appearance; to like to be well-groomed; (literary) on very friendly terms

愛美之心，人皆有之.pinyin: ai4 mei3 zhi1 xin1 , ren2 jie1 you3 zhi1

愛莫利維爾.definition: Emeryville, city on San Fransico Bay, California

愛莫能助.definition: unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you.; My hands are tied.

愛衛會.definition: Patriotic Health Committee (abbr. for 愛國衛生運動委員會|爱国卫生运动委员会[Ai4 guo2 Wei4 sheng1 Yun4 dong4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4])

愛詞霸.definition: iCIBA, online dictionary by Kingsoft Corporation, at www.iciba.com

愛護.definition: to cherish; to treasure; to take care of; to love and protect

愛財如命.definition: lit. to love money as much as one's own life (idiom); fig. avaricious; tightfisted

愛輝.definition: Aihui district of Heihe city 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang

愛輝區.definition: Aihui district of Heihe city 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang

愛迪生.definition: Edison (name); Thomas Alva Edison (1847-1931), American inventor and businessman

愛面子.definition: to like to look good in the eyes of others; sensitive about how one is regarded by others; proud

愛麗斯泉.definition: Alice Springs, town in central Australia (Tw)

愛麗絲泉.definition: Alice Springs, town in central Australia

愛麗絲漫遊奇境記.pinyin: Ai4 li4 si1 Man4 you2 Qi2 jing4 Ji4

愛麗舍宮.definition: Elysée Palace, the residence of the president of the French Republic

愛默生.definition: Ralph Waldo Emerson (1803-1882), American poet, essayist, and philosopher
